thing.title: Measuring Spoons
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: I have a set of measuring spoons that have their metric volumes printed alongside the classic names. With that info, it was just a quick trip to the ol' inverse-cube function to get the right size spoons made up. I want to do a version of these with some form of engraved labeling, but for now I figure they're worth putting up.I mean hey, you've got a sharpie, right?
